title: I Never Thought To Ask
description:
Jay tells Dan about having to explain the meaning of "TNT Size Queens" to his mother over the weekend. A conversation about beverages turns into a chat about pee, and it's place in the porn world. Jacob learns what a cream pie really is.

Stream "The Bonfire with Big Jay Oakerson & Dan Soder" for 3 months free on the SiruisXM app! Offer Details Apply: www.SiriusXM.com/Bonfire
